text: Good. News: #COVID19 #Vaccines: The tide is turning. Majority of #Black adults (61%) now say they plan to get–or have already received– #COVID_19 #vaccine, up sharply from 32% in September 2020. Still more work to do! #PewResearch #Hesitancy @NIH #NIH_CEAL https://t.co/ZQLwKxxoEL https://t.co/j1MvgWZGya
